The Government of Andhra Pradesh, represented by Shri Suryateja Mallavarapu IAS, CEO, APIS, and Shri Singamala Sreedhar, Joint Director, APIS, recently met with Dr. Sumeet Jarangal, Director at DPIIT, and the #StartupIndia team to enhance central and state government collaboration. 

Their discussions focused on DPIIT funding schemes for startups, developing new tech parks across Andhra Pradesh with an emphasis on manufacturing and strengthening the state's vibrant startup ecosystem, with more hubs like the Ratan Tata Innovation Hub (RTIH) which is playing a crucial role in supporting entrepreneurs.

Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

Shri Sanjiv | Shri Sumeet Jarangal 
Mamatha Venkatesh | Shivangi Jain | Pratiti S.
Anmol Agarwal | Ritwik Malhotra
Andhra Pradesh Innovation Society 

#AndhraPradesh #Startups #Innovation #RTIH #Entrepreneurship #StartupIndia

Hon'ble Prime Minister reaffirmed strong support for startups across sports management, technology, and manufacturing, envisioning a self-reliant India where youth play with locally made equipment.

From empowering rural talent to integrating sports into everyday education, the Khelo Bharat Niti 2025 sets the stage for India to emerge as a global sporting powerhouse.

Hon'ble Prime Minister also spotlighted the textile sector, a vibrant reflection of India's cultural diversity, where women artisans, young designers, and startup founders are coming together to drive growth and innovation.
As we approach the 10th National Handloom Day on 7th August 2025, let’s celebrate the spirit of #VocalForLocal and the role of startups in shaping India’s future.

Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

Shri Sanjiv | Shri Sumeet Jarangal

Read More: https://bit.ly/410JDsz 

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #Sports #Textile #StartupNews

According to Tracxn’s Maharashtra Tech Funding Report, the state recorded $1.4 Bn in total funding in the first half of 2025, reflecting an 8% growth over the previous half.
 
While late-stage investments declined, the overall funding trend highlights a stable and evolving investment climate, with early-stage innovation driving renewed interest from investors.

Read More: https://bit.ly/3IOGRAb

IKP Knowledge Park, in collaboration with Wadhwani Foundation, is thrilled to launch the Wadhwani Liftoff Program – a 12-week self-serve accelerator designed for early-stage startups ready to take their growth to the next level.

Through DIY gap discovery, expert mentorship, a peer community, and access to essential business tools and strategies for sustainable scaling, this program puts founders in the driver’s seat of their startup journey.

👉 If you are interested in this program, register here: https://lnkd.in/g__gXfaY 

📧 For any queries, kindly write to teambig@ikpknowledgepark.com 

Let’s liftoff!

This World Nature Conservation Day, we're reminded that the planet’s resources are finite, and the time to act is now.

At IKP Knowledge Park, we believe that science and innovation are not just tools, but powerful catalysts for conservation. From biodiversity tracking to sustainable materials, we support startups and researchers working at the intersection of environment and impact.

Watch how innovation can restore balance, and how we can build a greener tomorrow, one breakthrough at a time.

#WorldNatureConservationDay #Sustainability #ScienceForConservation #InnovationForImpact 

United Nations UN Environment Programme UN Biodiversity The Nature Conservancy IUCN WWF WWF-India MoEF&CC Deepanwita Chattopadhyay Bindu Nishal Dr. Priyankana Mukherjee Apoorva Bhatnagar Sridhar Ramanathan IKP EDEN IKP PRIME Aaqib Jameel Vithal K Lakkineni, Ph.D. Dedeepya Chermala Vishaka Sawan Ranajit Sen Anuradha Barua Sudha Kalyani Bommareddy, Ph.D. Rohika B Rajeswari Sepana Shreyas Kudva

It was a pleasure hosting Varun Raghuveeran and Sooraj K Babu from Dr. Moopen's iNEST | BioNEST Incubation Centre. We're excited about the potential this partnership holds and look forward to co-creating impactful healthcare solutions together.

On #NationalScienceDay2025, CCAMP is excited to share some of its work that demonstrates the power of science to solve societal problems 

We are proud to be fostering several next gen deep-science based innovative solutions and research that are bridging critical gaps in healthcare, agriculture and environment

Some of these include
🧪Mitigating antimicrobial resistance, strengthening maternal and child health, treating degenerative illnesses and cancer, and developing diagnostics for infectious diseases,
🧪Replacing chemical pesticides with biologicals, boosting crop productivity and farmer incomes, and increasing food security
 🧪Capturing carbon and adopting climate resilient solutions

And, much more!

Presenting you a short film on the C-CAMP ecosystem where young ideas are born, deep science questions are pursued, nurtured and empowered to leapfrog to global leadership

🔗https://lnkd.in/ebx8HGwV

#ViksitBharat2047 #ScienceImpactsLife #HappyNationalScienceDay

CCAMP hosted a team from the National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research, Guwahati, to explore synergies in translational research.

The team, led by Prof. (Dr.) USN Murty (Director, NIPER Guwahati & Additional Charge, NIPER Kolkata), toured the cutting-edge labs at the Bangalore Life Science Cluster (BLiSC) campus.

Looking forward to impactful partnerships ahead!

CCAMP had the pleasure of hosting a Young Political Leaders Delegation from Sri Lanka, led by Members of Parliament Hon. Amila Prasad and Hon. Chithral Fernando.

They met with our Director-CEO Taslimarif Saiyed, PhD and team leads to understand the innovation ecosystem, and explored potential collaboration.

The delegation, a diverse group of leaders — current and former MPs, legal professionals, legislative council members, youth council and workers' union representatives — also visited our cutting-edge labs!

Representatives from the High Commission of India in Sri Lanka, the Indian Council for Cultural Relations (ICCR), and IT BT Department, Karnataka Karnataka Digital Economy Mission (KDEM) also joined the visit, reinforcing India–Sri Lanka cooperation in science and tech development.

Ministry of External Affairs, India

📢 Bharat Pitchathon 4.0 - Opportunity to pitch to Top Investors of the country, is coming to your state 🚀

Thrilled to announce that the highly anticipated third edition of India's Premier Series of Pitch Event, Bharat Pitchathon 4.0, is coming to 20+ States.

We, at the IIT Mandi Catalyst are delighted to partner as the Incubation Partner for Bharat Pitchathon 4.0.

Bharat Pitchathon 3.0 was a journey like no other with over 200 startup pitches, 600 investor-startup connections, 6-month growth  program and the invaluable support of 220+ partners including incubator & investment partners. 

Registration link - https://lnkd.in/gFhNupCv

What's in store for you at Bharat Pitchathon 4.0?
🔹 Pitch to Top Investors: Present your ideas to top investors for potential partnerships and funding.
🔹 Expert Connection: Gain insights and guidance from industry experts.
🔹 Resource Riches: Gain access to a treasure trove of mentorship, networking, and growth opportunities.
🔹 High-Impact Visibility: Elevate your startup's reach and visibility.
🔹 Thrilling growth program: Selected startups receive comprehensive support including mentorship, GTM support with opportunities to pitch to prominent investors on a national scale.

But that's not all! 

🔹 Top 50 startups will be a part of an accelerator cohort for deep dive learning and growth opportunities.

Registration link - https://lnkd.in/gFhNupCv

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to shine and make your mark in the startup world.

Headstart Network Foundation
Dipankar Deb | Satvasheel Powar | Anil Singh | Gaurav P. | Harish Kanaujia | Salik Sarwar | Manish Singh | Ravinder Kumar | vishal sharma | Minni Kaur | Kushal Deep Jagota | Lipsa Rani Panda | Rewati Lal | Sanket Umap

#IITMandiCatalyst  #IITMandi #BharatPitchathon #StartupIndia #StartupEcosystem #Entrepreneurship #InvestorConnect #InnovationInIndia #HeadstartIndia #BuildForBharat #MakeInIndia #IncubationPartner

IIT Mandi, in collaboration with SIDBI, on 25th July celebrated a significant milestone with the graduation ceremony of the Rural Entrepreneurship Development Program (REDP) at IIT Mandi Catalyst. The event highlighted the transformative journey of rural entrepreneurs and featured an insightful session on the Mission Swavalamban Stand-Up India scheme.

The keynote address was delivered by Shri THR Samad, DGM, ROCH, SIDBI. He delivered a compelling talk on SIDBI’s initiatives to foster entrepreneurship, provided a detailed aspects of the Stand Up India scheme, including minimum loan amounts, promoter contributions, and the Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Stand Up India (CGTMSE).

Welcome & Catalyst Introduction: Mr. Gaurav P. (Manager, IIT Mandi Catalyst) set the stage with an inspiring introduction. He detailed IIT Mandi's support for startups, emphasizing resources, mentorship from faculty, IT support, and validation for ideas.

REDP Overview: Ms. Rewati Lal (Executive, IIT Mandi Catalyst) shared the impactful outcomes of the REDP, empowering rural communities through entrepreneurship.

Experience Sharing: REDP participants showcased their inspiring journeys, reflecting resilience and innovation.

Vote of Thanks: Mr. Anil Singh (General Manager, IIT Mandi Catalyst) concluded the event with heartfelt gratitude to all participants, guests, and organizers.

This event underscores the power of collaboration between IIT Mandi Catalyst and SIDBI in nurturing rural entrepreneurship and driving inclusive growth. Kudos to all the participants and stakeholders for their dedication to building a self-reliant India!

SIDBI(Small Industries Development Bank of India) | Timir Samad
Dipankar Deb | Satvasheel Powar | Harish Kanaujia | Salik Sarwar | Manish Singh | Ravinder Kumar | vishal sharma | Minni Kaur | Kushal Deep Jagota | Lipsa Rani Panda | Rewati Lal | Sanket Umap

#IITMandi #IITMandiCatalyst #RuralEntrepreneurship #REDP #SIDBI #StartupHimachal #EmpoweringCommunities #EntrepreneurshipDevelopment #MandiHimachal #StartupInHills

🔥 GET READY! The Himalayas are Calling You for it's Biggest Startup Fest! 🔥

IIT Mandi Catalyst is absolutely thrilled to announce the electrifying dates for the 9th Edition of the Himalayan Startup Trek (HST 2025) – our Annual Flagship Event and THE BIGGEST STARTUP EVENT OF THE HIMALAYAS! 🏔️✨

Mark your calendars and prepare for an unparalleled experience of innovation, collaboration, and breathtaking views!

📅 SAVE THE DATES: 6th | 7th | 8th November 2025 📍IIT Mandi, Campus Himachal Pradesh

We're inviting ALL our incredible startup ecosystem partners from India and across the globe to be a part of this spectacular gala! If you're passionate about innovation, driven by entrepreneurial spirit, and ready to make a significant impact in the vibrant Himalayan region, HST 2025 is YOUR stage!

Expect: 💥️ Groundbreaking ideas and pitches! 💡 Unmatched networking opportunities! 🏔️ Deep dives into the future of tech and impact! 🌟 Connections that will skyrocket your ventures!

Let's collectively ignite the spirit of innovation and entrepreneurship in the mountains! This is more than an event; it's a movement!

Don't miss out on shaping the future from the heart of the Himalayas!

Stay tuned for more updates, speaker announcements, and registration details! Get ready to #Learn #Network #Startup!

Indian Institute of Technology, Mandi | MeitY Startup Hub | Department of Science & Technology, Government of India | Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology | Startup India | Biotechnology Industry Research Assistance Council (BIRAC) | IIT Mandi iHub and HCI Foundation | SIDBI(Small Industries Development Bank of India)

𝗘𝗰𝗼-𝗘𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗲𝘂𝗿𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗧𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗹 𝗡𝗮𝗱𝘂 — 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗜𝘀 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗠𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁!

𝐺𝑜𝑡 𝑎 𝑔𝑟𝑒𝑒𝑛 𝑖𝑑𝑒𝑎 𝑤𝑖𝑡ℎ 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑝𝑜𝑡𝑒𝑛𝑡𝑖𝑎𝑙 𝑡𝑜 𝑐ℎ𝑎𝑛𝑔𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑙𝑑? 
𝑊ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑖𝑓 𝑓𝑢𝑛𝑑𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑤𝑎𝑠𝑛’𝑡 ℎ𝑜𝑙𝑑𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑏𝑎𝑐𝑘?

𝐺𝑒𝑡 𝑢𝑝 𝑡𝑜 ₹𝟳 𝗟𝗮𝗸𝗵𝘀 𝑖𝑛 𝑔𝑟𝑎𝑛𝑡 𝑠𝑢𝑝𝑝𝑜𝑟𝑡 𝑡𝑜 𝑡𝑢𝑟𝑛 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝑒𝑐𝑜-𝑖𝑛𝑛𝑜𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑖𝑛𝑡𝑜 𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑙, 𝑠𝑐𝑎𝑙𝑎𝑏𝑙𝑒 𝑖𝑚𝑝𝑎𝑐𝑡.

𝗟𝗲𝘁’𝘀 𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝘃𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻—𝘁𝗼𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿.

𝗔𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗡𝗼𝘄:ℎ𝑡𝑡𝑝𝑠://𝑏𝑖𝑡.𝑙𝑦/3𝑅𝑊6𝑜𝑍𝐼

𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗰𝗵 𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝘂𝘀 :
𝘁𝗮_𝗺𝗮𝗱𝗲𝗶𝘁@𝗶𝗶𝗶𝘁𝗱𝗺.𝗮𝗰.𝗶𝗻
+𝟵𝟭 𝟴𝟬𝟭𝟱𝟵𝟯𝟬𝟱𝟴𝟱

#EcoInnovation #SustainableFuture #TamilNaduStartups #GreenTech #ClimateAction #MaDeIT #EDII #StartupGrants #CleanTechIndia #GoGreenGrowBig

𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 & 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘀 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗮 𝗚𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁 𝗜𝗱𝗲𝗮!

𝐺𝑜𝑡 𝑎 𝑠𝑜𝑙𝑢𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑡ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑐𝑎𝑛 𝑟𝑒𝑣𝑜𝑙𝑢𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑖𝑧𝑒 𝑙𝑜𝑔𝑖𝑠𝑡𝑖𝑐𝑠, 𝑜𝑝𝑡𝑖𝑚𝑖𝑧𝑒 𝑝𝑟𝑜𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑒𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑡, 𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑎𝑘𝑒 𝑠𝑢𝑝𝑝𝑙𝑦 𝑐ℎ𝑎𝑖𝑛𝑠 𝑓𝑢𝑡𝑢𝑟𝑒-𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑑𝑦? 

𝗔𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗠𝗦𝗠𝗘 𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗔 𝗛𝗮𝗰𝗸𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗼𝗻 𝟱.𝟬 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑔𝑒𝑡 𝑓𝑢𝑛𝑑𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑢𝑝 𝑡𝑜 ₹𝟭𝟱 𝗟𝗮𝗸𝗵𝘀 𝑡𝑜 𝑏𝑟𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝑖𝑛𝑛𝑜𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑡𝑜 𝑙𝑖𝑓𝑒!

𝗟𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆: 𝗝𝘂𝗹𝘆 𝟯𝟭
𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗜𝗜𝗜𝗧𝗗𝗠 𝗞𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗲𝗽𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗺 𝗮𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗛𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗶𝘁𝘂𝘁𝗲
𝗖𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀: 𝗠𝗦𝗠𝗘𝘀 & 𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀

📊 Thank You, Dr. Raghunandan NK! 💡

🙏 We at DERBI Foundation extend our sincere appreciation to Dr. Raghunandan N K for conducting a high-impact workshop on the Business Model Canvas (BMC) for our startup cohort.

🕴 The session offered deep insights into how startups can move beyond traditional business planning to embrace flexible, iterative, and value-driven models. 

🪞 From refining the value proposition and customer segmentation to mapping key metrics, pricing strategies, and leveraging unfair advantages, the workshop equipped our founders with practical tools to build, test, and evolve their models.

Key highlights included:
 ✅ Understanding the BMC framework and its adaptability
 ✅ The Build-Measure-Learn loop in validating startup assumptions
 ✅ Identifying customer pain points and market demand
 ✅ Real-life examples that grounded theory in startup reality

Thank you, Dr. Raghunandan, for empowering our startups with the clarity and structure needed to navigate their growth with confidence and strategy!

Sathyanarayana B V | Bhavani G | Dr. Adithya Hande | Daamini Sharma | MeitY Startup Hub | Pankaj Anand | Startup Karnataka | Karnataka Digital Economy Mission (KDEM) | 

#BusinessModelCanvas #StartupAcceleration #DERBIFoundation #MentorshipMatters #EarlyStageStartups #BuildMeasureLearn #Innovation #Entrepreneurship #StartupSupport #StrategyExecution #ThankYou

https://www.linkedin.com/company/social-.text:
Cut the Fat, Not the Flow

The development sector is drowning in intermediaries—re-granting agencies, consultants, collectives, and collaboratives.....Too often, they justify their existence with buzzwords like “systems change,” “capacity building,” “ecosystem,” and “platforms,” while delivering little beyond roundtables with the same faces in new venues, glossy reports where fonts change more than the data, flashy websites, feel-good videos (about themselves), feel-sad videos (about communities), and databases no one trusts.

The problem isn’t intermediation—it’s bad intermediation. When done well, intermediaries can aggregate demand, align incentives, allocate capital efficiently, and manage risk. But when they morph into self-reinforcing bureaucracies, they stall progress and drain resources, especially when led by people with no personal stake in the outcome. Low "skin in the game" means leaders enjoy asymmetric rewards without bearing consequences. They are insulated from failure, making them risk-averse and impact-light.

We need to rethink the chain. Funders must back proximate actors directly, invest in real capacity, and shift accountability from process to outcomes. The goal isn’t fewer intermediaries—it’s better ones. The best ones are entrepreneurs. They put their credibility, sweat, and future on the line.
Communities don’t need more gatekeepers. They need partners who deliver.

At Social Alpha, we work with bold innovators solving tough challenges—from sustainable farming to equitable healthcare. As part of our Communications team, you’ll get to turn their work into stories that matter. 
Know someone who’d be a good fit? Or see yourself here? 
 
Write to us at careers@socialalpha.org with your resume/cover letter.

Find the detailed job descriptions in the links below:
Content Associate - https://lnkd.in/gcTQBUNp
Digital Marketing Associate - https://lnkd.in/g8hdGx4a 
 
#NoHashtags #JustImpact

As India’s agriculture sector grapples with climate uncertainty, water stress, and rising input costs, the need for resilient, scalable innovations has never been more urgent.  

Krishi Mangal, an initiative by Social Alpha and Cisco CSR, is looking for start-ups working to shape the future of agriculture. 

Now in its third edition, Krishi Mangal invites applications from start-ups developing affordable, scalable, and field-validated technologies that strengthen India’s agricultural resilience.  

The program is open to innovations solving for Integrated Farming Management, Soil Rejuvenation and Irrigation Management, Farm Mechanisation, Post-Harvest Management, and Livestock Waste Management.  

Applications close on 13th July 2025. Apply now: https://lnkd.in/gNwjafu8

From Hubballi to the Heart of Bharat: Deshpande Startups is redefining grassroots innovation 🚀

Led by Manish Jaiswal, Deshpande Startups is one of India’s largest livelihood-focused incubators — proving that world-class startups can rise from tier-2 India.

💡 From climate-smart agriculture to rural fintech and women-led enterprises, their startups are solving for:
 – Sustainable livelihoods
 – Scalable rural solutions
 – Inclusive economic growth

🎓 Backed by the Deshpande Foundation, this ecosystem blends innovation, mentorship, and real-world testing — right where Bharat lives.

📍 From Hubballi to hundreds of hinterland founders, Deshpande Startups is building not just companies, but a rural startup revolution.

https://www.linkedin.com/company/venture.text:
Ready-to-Use Labs, Offices, and Desks and much more at India's largest incubator for science and technology based startups! Come.... 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝘂𝗯𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘂𝘀!

Venture Center is an award winning, leading incubator for deeptech, knowledge intensive startups, and our 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗜𝗻𝗰𝘂𝗯𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 for startups offers a range of benefits—without taking any equity!

1. World-Class Infrastructure

Access to state-of-the-art labs, fully equipped offices, and flexible desks. Our facilities are designed to meet the diverse needs of startups, providing everything you need to innovate and grow.

2. Expert Mentorship and Guidance

24/7 access to in-house expertise, in addition to customized one-on-one mentoring from industry veterans. 

3. Funding Opportunities

Access to seed funds, CSR funds, and government grants for different stages of your journey.

4. Prime Location

We are based in Pune, a city known for its thriving tech and innovation scene, and we are in close proximity to prestigious educational institutions and research centers. 

5. Comprehensive Ecosystem

Our extensive support network includes legal assistance, business development resources, regulatory and IP support, and access to workshops and events that provide valuable insights and networking opportunities. 

6. Vibrant peer group community on our campus

Surround yourself with like-minded innovators and entrepreneurs who can inspire and support your startup journey. 

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝘂𝘀 𝘁𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆! We're looking for startups with an innovative idea or technology in the early stages with a scalable business model!

#StartupValuation #FinancialModelling #InvestorReadiness #EarlyStageStartups #VentureStudioEvents

The best startup advice often comes between the slides - in those unscripted moments when successful entrepreneurs share what really happened.

Over the weekend at Ahmedabad University, we witnessed exactly that. Author and entrepreneur Ankur Warikoo sat with aspiring founders and shared the unvarnished truth about purpose, failure, and playing the long game in entrepreneurship.

No sugar-coating. No typical motivational quotes. Just real talk about what it actually takes to build something meaningful.

The energy in the room was electric as young innovators and ecosystem enablers connected over shared challenges and breakthrough moments. These are the conversations that matter - the ones that go beyond pitch decks and funding rounds.

Four incredible startups supported by VentureStudio showcased their innovations:
- CERVICHECK by Pragmatech Healthcare Solutions Pvt. Ltd. by Pragmatech Healthcare Solutions - revolutionizing women's health
- Socal Media - transforming digital engagement
- HasiEco Ventures - building sustainable solutions
- Bijoi | Handloom & Handicraft - preserving traditional crafts with modern innovation

We also celebrated the signing of an MoU with FICCI YFLO Ahmedabad. Huge thanks to Neha Goyal (Chairperson) and Shreyra Siryoya (Jt. Secretary) for making this partnership possible.

Events like these remind me why building an entrepreneurial ecosystem matters. It's not just about funding or mentorship - it's about creating spaces where founders can learn from each other's real experiences.

What's the best unfiltered advice you've received as an entrepreneur? Share below 👇

Hardi Shah Aikya Shetty Palna Patel Ekshika Bhagtani

#Entrepreneurship #StartupEcosystem #Innovation #WomenInBusiness #AnkurWarikoo

https://www.linkedin.com/company/icreate.text:
Proud to share a pioneering milestone by Oceanlux CCU (Prop + Climate-tech) Architecture, an iCreate-supported Climate Tech startup.

Its bio-inspired air purification system is now live at Adani Jaipur International Airport — Asia’s first, and the world’s second (after Pittsburgh, USA), such innovation at any airport.

OceanTree – a next-gen microalgae-based CCUS device – mimics six mature trees, capturing CO₂, SOx, NOx, CO, PM2.5, PM10, and releasing fresh oxygen through artificial photosynthesis. Installed at Terminal 1 and Terminal 2, redefining indoor air quality and the green building concept.
Inaugurated by Mr. Anurag Bhatt, CEO, Adani Jaipur Airport, this initiative aligns with Adani’s ESG vision and India’s mission for net-zero innovation.

Oceanlux is not just building a product — it's planting a new standard for breathable, sustainable environments.

Meet the changemakers:
 – Gaurav Raghav – Founder & CEO
 – Deep prakash singh – Co-founder & Head of Manufacturing
 – Jyotsana Gupta – Co-founder, CFO & CMO
Next: Expansion to airports, hospitals, schools, malls, hotels, and smart cities.
Supported by iCreate – India’s top incubator for tech-driven impact.

#iCreateWithYou #CarbonCapture #GreenBuildings #ESG #DeepTech #AirQuality #ArtificialPhotosynthesis #SmartInfrastructure #AirportInnovation #ClimateAction #Oceanlux #OceanTree #CleanAir #TechForGood #FoundersToFollow #SustainableIndia #StartupInnovation #BreatheBetter

https://www.linkedin.com/company/icreate.text:
As part of the #ProtoQuik Launchpad Cohort 1, we had the privilege of hosting Dr Amit Ray, a seasoned Naval Architect with the Indian Navy, for an insightful session on the future of marine robotics.

Bringing decades of domain expertise, Dr. Ray shed light on the real-world deployment of underwater systems—ranging from advanced firefighting technologies to the complexities of underwater navigation. He offered a deep dive into the operational trade-offs between AUVs and ROVs, while also unpacking challenges like energy constraints and communication blackouts in subsea environments.

His perspectives bridged defense and industry use cases—offering our innovators a rare look into the nuanced demands of underwater robotics from someone who has navigated them firsthand.

#ProtoQuikLaunchpad #iCreateWithYou #MarineRobotics #UnderwaterNavigation #AUV #ROV #IndianNavy #DefenseInnovation #StartupSupport #DeepTechFounders #FirefightingTech #InnovationInAction

Designing the Future: Smarter, Faster, Simulation-Driven

As part of the #ProtoQuik Launchpad Cohort 1, we hosted an in-depth session with experts from SOLIDWORKS and 3DEXPERIENCE Works, facilitated by Best Engineering Aids & Consultancies (BEACON India) — empowering Robotics innovators with a hands-on understanding of modern design and simulation workflows.

The session began with an introduction by Swapnil Barot, Regional Head – Gujarat at BEACON India. This was followed by Ronak Kamani, who demonstrated how to build smarter and faster products using SOLIDWORKS.
The second half featured an advanced discussion on simulation-driven design—including FEA, CFD, and EMAG—led by Theophilus Dsouza and Venkatesh S S, helping participants explore how virtual testing and optimisation can significantly reduce development time and risk.

For the ProtoQuik Robotics cohort, it was a deep dive into building better, smarter, and more resilient systems—starting from the digital workspace.

#ProtoQuik #iCreateWithYou #SOLIDWORKS #3DEXPERIENCE #SwapnilBarot #RonakKamani #TheophilusDsouza #VenkateshSS #BEACON #BEACONIndia #SimulationDrivenDesign #RoboticsInnovation #DigitalEngineering #DesignToDeployment
